## __Publications & Conference Papers__

__Navon, M.__ & Bar-Anan, Y. (2019). *The Affleck-Murphy effect: The relative influence of group membership and individuating knowledge on the deliberate and automatic evaluation of known group members*. Manuscript under review,  [preprint](https://psyarxiv.com/pwuda/).
